message.body: Hey! Since you're an art reader could you look at a grad statement for me?
Yes! You have another week before I charge people haha bc I just started setting up my arts writing copyediting business ￼

Lol also I just set up the website (haven't edited it yet but set up indexhibit) and now I know basic website set up if you ever need that (as in, to not go through Wordpress or squarespace but instead pay far less and build your own)
Haha woah that site! And awesome! I will send it over. Really short
